for (m <- 0 to 3){
      var sum = BigInt(0)
      for (n <- 0 to 3){
        println (Data1.one_1ist(4*m+n)+"  "+toBigInt(Data1.one_1ist(4*m+n)))
        sum += toBigInt(Data1.one_1ist(4*m+n))
      }
      println(sum)
    }
